job.title: Senior Software Quality Engineer
job.description:
An in-vitro diagnostic medical device organization, who are scaling at a rapid rate, are looking for a motivated Senior Software Quality Engineer to join their talented team on a remote basis.

Senior Software Quality Engineer Responsibilities
  • Establish end-to-end automated tests using JavaScript, Selenium WebDriver, Appium, and other technologies.
  • Independently work through developing, executing, and reporting of V&V plans and complex test protocols.
  • Work with team to create and execute an SDLC with automated traceability.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive test cases and plans.
  • Execute manual system integration tests.
  • Identify and thoroughly document bugs.
  • Assure that our product matches or exceeds our patients’ and clinicians’ expectations.
Senior Software Quality Engineer Skills And Qualifications
  • BS in computer science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience.
  • 6+ years experience in the software quality industry.
  • 3+ years experience in medical devices.
  • Expertise in test methodologies, writing test plans and cases, and debugging.
  • 2+ years exposure to automation testing frameworks and paradigms.
  • Prior experience developing or testing in compliance with recognized regulatory standards (21 CFR Part 820).
  • Demonstrable aptitude towards learning new technologies.
